articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: The first trailer for Everything Everywhere All At Once reveals what we all want: a Michelle Yeoh multiverse - The Verge
articles.description: Michelle Yeoh stars as Evelyn Wang in Everything Everywhere All At Once, “an exhausted Chinese American woman who can’t seem to finish her taxes.” However, the movie has a lot more going on than its description entails.
articles.content: Get ready to travel between universes

articles.author: Peter Stone
articles.title: The network of election lawyers who are making it harder for Americans to vote - The Guardian
articles.description: Voting rights watchdogs have warned of a web of attorneys and groups, some who pushed Donald Trump’s big lie after the 2020 election
articles.content: A powerful network of conservative election lawyers and groups with links to Donald Trump have spent millions of dollars promoting new and onerous voting laws that many key battleground states such a… [+6746 chars]

articles.title: Are tornadoes linked to climate change? The science isn't yet definite - CNA
articles.description:
WASHINGTON: Was climate change behind the recent tornadoes that killed dozens of people and wrought a trail of destruction through five American states?

SHIFTING PATTERNS
The average number of tornadoes per year in the United States has not increased in recent years, hovering around 1,300, with most occurring in spring.
